name: Seed of Skandha
description:
After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG: Deals 1 Dendro DMG to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.
Usage(s): 1
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> Deals 1 $[K107] to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color> to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color>
